ErrorDialog.title: An Error Occurred
ErrorDialog.logfileTip: Log file has been saved to:
ErrorDialog.reportTip: If the issue persists, please report it on GitHub and attach the log file.

UserTour.title: User Tour
UserTour.subtitle: This is your first time using FormuLaTex. ðŸ¤—Do you need to simply show you how to use the software? (You can always restart the tour in Settings)

step1.whole: This is the Quick Input area where you can create and manage your formulas.
step1.createFormula-button: Click the New button to create a new formula.
step1.tags-list: This is the tag list where you can manage formulas under different categories.
step1.expression-list: This shows the formulas under the current tag. Right-click a formula to edit or delete it.

step2.whole: This is the Symbol Select area where you can choose commonly used mathematical symbols.

step3.whole: This is the Formula Editing & Preview area. You can edit formula content on the left and preview it on the right.
step3.tools-bar: This is the toolbar where you can choose the font, size, and color of the formula.
step3.upload-button: Click the Upload Image button to recognize formulas in an image.
step3.askAI-button: Click the Ask AI button to jump to the AI chat area.

step4.whole: Click this button to open the AI chat panel, where you can ask any questions about formulas.

step5.settings-button: The Settings menu is located here, where you can configure the app language, DeepSeek and SimpleTex API settings, and more.

SettingsMenu.title: Settings
SettingsMenu.saveOrCancelFirst: Please save or cancel editing first.
